response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by myself. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth to me and the market value, I am offering it to you for $120. This is a special offer tailored to appreciate your interest and ensure you get a great deal. Please let me know if this proposal suits your budget and needs.", "product_price": 120}
